alert.note: Alert for Central Phoenix; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:42PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 415 PM MST... At 342 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Laveen, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Tolleson, Laveen, South Mountain Park, Downtown Phoenix, Sky Harbor Airport, South Phoenix, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Downtown Glendale and Komatke. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 135 and 152. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 205. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Phoenix; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
